item.description:
***Note: There will be some parking issues for this Meetup. It was just posted that our neighborhood from October 1 to November 1 will be resident parking only. So, this will cause problems for our out-of-town members. If anyone not in Salem or in an area of Salem not affected by parking would like to host this night, please let me know. Otherwise, we are a 10-minute walk from the Salem Commuter Rail. Anyone that knows they will have an issue with parking, please e-mail me at olivia.radue@gmail.com. Hopefully we can set up a rideshare with other members. Or, if everyone is willing to meet at one place where people can park (grocery parking lot, etc), then David or I can go pick up a carload. Again, please let me know if parking will be an issue. Also, let me know if you are a Salem resident willing to rideshare. Thanks.***


I decided to try a weeknight game night to try to appeal to some of the people who haven't been able to do Friday nights.

Even if we have a small group this go around, we'll get a feel for who can meet on Wednesday. So, let's plan to get together on Wednesday, October 24 from 7:30-10:30. I do realize that this is getting close to Halloween for those who would need to drive into Salem. I also thought driving would be slightly easier on a Wednesday as opposed to a Friday.

The house is at 21 Lemon St. and is pumpkin colored. There is parking (non-resident) on Lemon St., Northey St., and Cross St. The house is also within walking distance of most of downtown Salem and we're a short walk from the commuter rail.

For those of you who can't do either Wednesday or Fridays nights, if you have a night you prefer and are willing to host, please send me an e-mail and we'll set it up. If you are willing to host regardless, please e-mail me with the dates that you would like to and how many people you can accommodate.

We certainly hope to see you though. The nights we have gotten together have been really fun, and we're looking forward to more.

group.name: The Salem Board Games Meetup Group

item.name: Wednesday Night Games
